text.text: Like Bows, Arrows have different stats to their Melee and Harvest counterparts. However, arrows also retain those stats.
The first is Speed - Speed refers to how quickly through the air arrows fly.
Next is Weight - I did some testing and found out that heavier arrows fly farther. Using different trajectories, I found that heavier arrows follow more favorable trajectories.
Finally, there's Accuracy - It's the same as accuracy for bows.
